summary: Connect Claude Desktop's remote MCP client to the local OODS HTTP bridge for read-only tooling.
notes: Claude Desktop currently cannot forward custom headers for remote MCP servers. Leave BRIDGE_TOKEN unset when pairing with the desktop client, or run a tokenless bridge for local development.
Approval headers are only required when a tool requests apply=true. This profile defaults to apply=false for read-only usage.
Set MCP_BRIDGE_PORT before launching the bridge if port 4466 is unavailable.
